verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3050><s%> from the heavens <S%H8064><s%>: Praise <S%H1984><s%> him in the heights <S%H4791><s%>.
Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye him <S%H4397><s%>, all his angels: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye him <S%H6635><s%>, all his host.
Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye him <S%H8121><s%>, sun and moon <S%H3394><s%>: Praise <S%H1984><s%> him <S%H3556><s%>, all ye stars of light <S%H216><s%>.
Praise <S%H1984><s%> him <S%H8064><s%>, ye heavens of heavens <S%H8064><s%>, And ye waters <S%H4325><s%> that are above the heavens <S%H8064><s%>.
Let them praise <S%H1984><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; For he commanded <S%H6680><s%>, and they were created <S%H1254><s%>.
He hath also established <S%H5975><s%> them for ever <S%H5703><s%> and ever <S%H5769><s%>: He hath made <S%H5414><s%> a decree <S%H2706><s%> which shall not pass away <S%H5674><s%>.
Praise <S%H1984><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> from the earth <S%H776><s%>, Ye sea-monsters <S%H8577><s%>, and all deeps <S%H8415><s%>.
Fire <S%H784><s%> and hail <S%H1259><s%>, snow <S%H7950><s%> and vapor <S%H7008><s%>; Stormy <S%H5591><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%>, fulfilling <S%H6213><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%>;
Mountains <S%H2022><s%> and all hills <S%H1389><s%>; Fruitful <S%H6529><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%> and all cedars <S%H730><s%>;
Beasts <S%H2416><s%> and all cattle <S%H929><s%>; Creeping things <S%H7431><s%> and flying <S%H3671><s%> birds <S%H6833><s%>;
Kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> and all peoples <S%H3816><s%>; Princes <S%H8269><s%> and all judges <S%H8199><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>;
Both young men <S%H970><s%> and virgins <S%H1330><s%>; Old men <S%H2205><s%> and children <S%H5288><s%>:

Let them praise <S%H1984><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; For his name <S%H8034><s%> alone is exalted <S%H7682><s%>; His glory <S%H1935><s%> is above the earth <S%H776><s%> and the heavens <S%H8064><s%>.

And he hath lifted <S%H7311><s%> up the horn <S%H7161><s%> of his people <S%H5971><s%>, The praise <S%H8416><s%> of all his saints <S%H2623><s%>; Even of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, a people <S%H5971><s%> near <S%H7138><s%> unto him <S%H1984><s%>. Praise ye Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>.
